CoreArenaCLI

A modular, extensible command-line toolkit offering utilities and developer tools built with Node.js. Designed for scalability, clean architecture, and community contribution.

View Documentation GitHub Repository
corearena-cli
$ corearena init
✓ Initializing CoreArenaCLI...
✓ CLI configured successfully
$ corearena create arena |

Core Components

CoreArenaCLI consists of three integrated components working together

codearena-cli

The command-line interface built with oclif that provides a powerful CLI for interacting with the CoreArena platform.

  • Modular command structure
  • Extensible architecture
  • Cross-platform support
  • Developer-friendly API

codearena-server

The backend REST API built with Express.js that handles persistent data, authentication, and code execution.

  • RESTful API design
  • Database models & migrations
  • OAuth authentication
  • Docker sandbox integration

codearena-web

A modern Next.js web application providing a user-friendly interface for the CoreArena platform.

  • React-based UI
  • Server-side rendering
  • Responsive design
  • Real-time updates

Why CoreArenaCLI?

Built for developers, by developers

Modular Design

Extensible architecture that allows you to add custom commands and functionality easily.

High Performance

Optimized for speed and efficiency, built with modern Node.js best practices.

Secure by Default

OAuth authentication, Docker sandboxing, and secure code execution environments.

Docker Ready

Full Docker support with containerized deployment and sandbox execution.

Easy Deployment

Multiple deployment options including Vercel, Railway, and traditional VPS setups.

Open Source

Licensed under Apache 2.0, welcoming contributions from the community.

CoreArenaCLI

A modular, extensible command-line toolkit built with Node.js.
